item.title: http status handling in deno
item.description: handling http status codes http_status module provides an enum

item.title: node garbage collection
item.description: 1 2 3 4 5 import { setFlagsFromString } from 'v8'; import { runInNewContext } from 'vm'; setFlagsFromString('--expose_gc'); const gc = runInNewContext('gc'); // nocommit gc(); https://stackoverflow.

item.title: reading content from Blob
item.description: src 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 var myBlob = new Blob(["Hello"], {type : "text/plain"}); var myReader = new FileReader(); //handler executed once reading(blob content referenced to a variable) from blob is finished.
